tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UrbanDevelopmentProjects ( 
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    project_name VARCHAR(255), 
    project_description TEXT, 
    project_location GEOGRAPHY)

CREATE TABLE geospatial_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    land_use VARCHAR,
    infrastructure VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE urban_development (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE land_use_types (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    land_use_type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE urban_development (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  developer_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
